name: Five Nights At Wynstons
description:
}------==== FIVE NIGHTS AT WYNSTONS ====------{

        

 ]-------------- Heart - & - Star --------------[

    

------------------ Objectives Introduction -----------------

When you click "New Game" you will be put into an office and your objective is to survive 5 nights by conserving your power and watching Wynston on the cams. He will wander throughout the mansion and will try to get to your office. If he does successfully get to the office, he will appear at one of the entrances.

---------------------------CONTROLS-----------------------------

 There are 2 entrances, to the right or left of you in the office. To the left, there is a vent that can be opened or closed by a button next to it. For the right door, it follows the same rules, also with a button next to it. 

To stop Wynston from killing you, close the vent or the door in under 3 seconds or he will jumpscare you, and you will die. Also, there will be a music box to the right of you, and you will have to wind it up by clicking on it possibly many times.
